name: Yiqun Liu 0001
content: Yiqun Liu | Home Yiqun Liu yiqunliu AT tsinghua.edu.cn Follow Location Weibo Github Google Scholar English Resume Chinese Resume Our paper "Explicit factor models for explainable recommendation based on phrase-level sentiment analysis" won the Test of Time Award at SIGIR 2024. Our paper "Scaling Laws For Dense Retrieval" won the Best Paper Award at SIGIR 2024. I serve as Steering Committee co-Chair for SIGIR-AP. I served as co-chair for SIGIR 2024 Short Paper Track and PC for Perspectives/DC/Tutorial papers. I was recognized as a member of the ACM SIGIR Academy for "significant, cumulative contributions to the development of the field of information retrieval". I serve as General Co-chair of NTCIR-18. I am on the editorial board of JASIST and Information Retrieval Journal. From 2017 to 2024, I serve as co-Editor-in-Chief of Foundations and Trends@ in Information Retrieval.
